content: archived pdf http //web archive org/web/20120127234921/http //www caron com/projects/ft/summer_shawl pdf materials caron international s feathers * discontinued * 65% acrylic / 35% nylon 1 75oz / 50g 70yd / 64m 8 skeins #0009 sandpiper crochet hook us size k/10 5 6 5mm tapestry needle tn gauge in pattern st 5 \ double_crochet chain 1 and 5 row = 4 /10 cm pattern stitch is very flexible gauge is not crucial for this project stitches used chain chain double_crochet double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet triple crochet treble_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch work shawl in pattern 1-row repeat finish with shell edging and fringe
